room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game Cincinnati in Cincinnati
review: We took our entire management team to The Escape Game for a team building exercise and everyone LOVED it! This is not your ordinary escape room and much more interactive than other places most of our team has been too! (Plus, for just opening, there were little to no hiccups!)

room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game Cincinnati in Cincinnati
review: Our Sales Team went to the Escape Game for a Team Building event. We had a fantastic time! The staff was extremely friendly and fun. The game itself was challenging, but not overwhelming. I would recommend them for a great outing!

room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game Cincinnati in Cincinnati
review: We worked with the Escape Game for a corporate team building activity. They were very professional and helpful with setting up our event. The room itself was challenging and exciting. We didn't get out, but we will learn for next time! Definitely will be going here again!!!

room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game Cincinnati in Cincinnati
review: Teamwork Required Adventure - played with 3 co-workers and finished with 51 seconds remaining - decent

room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game Cincinnati in Cincinnati
review: SUPER fun! Their escape "room" isn't just one room, but instead a series of rooms that is unlike any other escape places I have experienced. This would be an excellent place for a team building event or a night out with friends.
